original_text: These are the sons of Zibeon: Aiah and Anah; he is the Anah who found the hot springs in the wilderness, as he pastured the donkeys of Zibeon his father.
korean_text: 시브온의 자녀는 아야와 아나며 이 아나는 그 아버지 시브온의 나귀를 칠 때에 광야에서 온천을 발견하였고

sentences.original_text: These are the sons of Zibeon
who found the hot springs in the wilderness
as he pastured the donkeys of Zibeon his father
